prompt:
Please answer my code questions using the given API following this format: <<<api>>>: $API
<<<code>>>: $CODE
<<<explanation>>>: $EXPLANATION.
For API SQLiteDatabase.query, the API usage rule is: Query a SQLiteDatabase using a specified query and parameters, then close it.

Question: retrieve more than one field from SQLite database and compare with these field: :i want compare user name and password from database if exists than it success if not than throws error  i use SQLiteOpenHelper to don a task i can get one field from database now how can i retrieve multiple fields public UserInfo get_user_by_id(String id) {        SQLiteDatabase db = this.getReadableDatabase();        UserInfo userInfo = null;        Cursor cursor = db.query(TABLE_NAME, new String[]{COLUMN_APP_ID}, COLUMN_APP_ID + "=?", new String[]{id + ""}, null, null, null);           while (cursor.moveToNext()) {               //userInfo.setAppId(cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_APP_ID)));               userInfo = new UserInfo(cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_APP_ID)));           }Please help me thanks in advance 
Please using this api: SQLiteDatabase.query.
Answer:
response:
<<<api>>>: SQLiteDatabase.query
<<<code>>>: 
public UserInfo get_user_by_id(String id) {
    SQLiteDatabase db = this.getReadableDatabase();
    UserInfo userInfo = null;
    Cursor cursor = db.query(TABLE_NAME, new String[]{COLUMN_APP_ID, COLUMN_USERNAME, COLUMN_PASSWORD}, COLUMN_APP_ID + "=?", new String[]{id + ""}, null, null, null);
    while (cursor.moveToNext()) {
        String appId = cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_APP_ID));
        String username = cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_USERNAME));
        String password = cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_PASSWORD));
        userInfo = new UserInfo(appId, username, password);
    }
    cursor.close();
    db.close();
    return userInfo;
}

<<<explanation>>>: 
To retrieve multiple fields from the SQLite database, you need to modify the query method to include the additional columns you want to retrieve. In this case, you want to retrieve the username and password along with the appId. So, you need to pass an array of column names containing COLUMN_APP_ID, COLUMN_USERNAME, and COLUMN_PASSWORD as the second parameter of the query method.

Then, inside the while loop, you can retrieve the values of the username and password columns using the getColumnIndex method and set them in the UserInfo object.

Finally, make sure to close the cursor and the database after you have finished using them.

<<<api>>>: SQLiteDatabase.query
<<<code>>>: 
public UserInfo get_user_by_id(String id) {
    SQLiteDatabase db = this.getReadableDatabase();
    UserInfo userInfo = null;
    Cursor cursor = db.query(TABLE_NAME, new String[]{COLUMN_APP_ID, COLUMN_USERNAME, COLUMN_PASSWORD}, COLUMN_APP_ID + "=?", new String[]{id + ""}, null, null, null);
    while (cursor.moveToNext()) {
        String appId = cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_APP_ID));
        String username = cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_USERNAME));
        String password = cursor.getString(cursor.getColumnIndex(COLUMN_PASSWORD));
        userInfo = new UserInfo(appId, username, password);
    }
    cursor.close();
    db.close();
    return userInfo;
}

<<<explanation>>>: 
To retrieve multiple fields from the SQLite database, you need to modify the query method to include the additional columns you want to retrieve. In this case, you want to retrieve the username and password along with the appId. So, you need to pass an array of column names containing COLUMN_APP_ID, COLUMN_USERNAME, and COLUMN_PASSWORD as the second parameter of the query method.

Then, inside the while loop, you can retrieve the values of the username and password columns using the getColumnIndex method and set them in the UserInfo object.

Finally, make sure to close the cursor and the database after you have finished using them.
